FOOTNOTES: [1985]- An oath in which Allāh swears by time throughout the ages.

ARABIC_TEXT: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
TRANSLATION: (3) Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
